movies.title: Dot.com
movies.plot: Pedro, an engineer posted in a village in the North of Portugal, waits desperately to be transferred back to Lisbon. Ever since his road project was cancelled, he's had nothing to do except work on the village website he created. Just when a transfer seems imminent, Pedro receives a letter from a large multinational. They summon Pedro to close the site, citing domain name infringement. Failure to do so will result in a 500.000 Euro lawsuit. But only the village association can close the site. And the villagers refuse. Their logic: if the site is worth 500.000 Euros in damages, then it's worth 500.000 Euros. The situation spins out of control when the press gets wind of the story and the villagers' plight becomes a cause célèbre from New York to Hong Kong. But as interest rises, so does dissension in the village. Under the media spotlight, the villagers start to change - and not always for the better.
movies.simplePlot: Pedro, an engineer posted in a village in the North of Portugal, waits desperately to be transferred back to Lisbon. Ever since his road project was cancelled, he's had nothing to do except...

biography.bio: João Tempera was born on May 15, 1979 in Lisbon, Portugal. He is known for his work on Jura (2006), Dot.com (2007) and Os Filhos do Rock (2013).
biography.name: João Tempera

biography.bio: María Adánez was born on March 12, 1976 in Madrid, Spain as María Adánez Almenara. She is an actress and director, known for Aquí no hay quien viva (2003), Maitena: Estados alterados (2008) and La que se avecina (2007). She was previously married to David Murphy.
biography.name: María Adánez

biography.bio: Marco Delgado was born on October 18, 1972 in Portugal as Marco Tavares Delgado. He is an actor, known for Queridas Feras (2003), Doce Tentação (2012) and Tempo de Viver (2006).
biography.name: Marco Delgado

biography.bio: Isabel Abreu was born on March 3, 1978 in Arronches, Portugal. She is an actress, known for Pai à Força (2009), Queridas Feras (2003) and Chorus (2014).
biography.name: Isabel Abreu

biography.bio: Margarida Carpinteiro was born on June 16, 1943 in Lisbon, Portugal. She is an actress and writer, known for Dancin' Days (2012), Laços de Sangue (2010) and Mar Salgado (2014).
biography.name: Margarida Carpinteiro

biography.bio: José Eduardo was born on August 4, 1945 in Portugal as José Eduardo Nunes dos Santos. He is an actor, known for Deixa Que Te Leve (2009), Fascínios (2007) and Dei-te Quase Tudo (2005).
biography.name: José Eduardo

biography.bio: Lia Gama was born on May 28, 1944 in Fundao, Portugal as Maria Isilda da Gama Gil. She is an actress, known for Laços de Sangue (2010), Sol de Inverno (2013) and Fascínios (2007).
biography.name: Lia Gama

biography.bio: Maria José was born on September 12, 1927 in Lisbon, Portugal. She is known for her work on Meu Amor (2009), Vidas de Sal (1996) and Fascínios (2007).
biography.name: Maria José

biography.placeOfBirth: Canas de Senhorim, Beira Alta, Portugal
biography.bio: Tony Correia was born in 1953 in Canas de Senhorim, Beira Alta, Portugal as Antonio Fernandes Alves Correia. He is an actor and writer, known for Dot.com (2007), Iracema, a Virgem dos Lábios de Mel (1979) and O Guarani (1979). He has been married to Renata since 1983. They have two children.
biography.name: Tony Correia

biography.bio: Pedro Alpiarça was born in 1958 in Portugal. He was an actor, known for Fábrica de Anedotas (2001), Não És Homem Não És Nada (1999) and Dot.com (2007). He died on September 20, 2007 in Lisbon, Portugal.
biography.name: Pedro Alpiarça

biography.bio: Adriano Luz was born on April 9, 1959 in Oporto, Portugal. He is known for his work on Morangos com Açúcar (2003), Remédio Santo (2011) and Sentimentos (2009).
biography.name: Adriano Luz

biography.bio: André Nunes was born on April 26, 1979 in Portugal. He is an actor, known for Doida por Ti (2012), Mar de Paixão (2010) and Feitiço de Amor (2008).
biography.name: André Nunes

biography.bio: Carlos Santos was born on October 4, 1937 in Lisbon, Portugal. He was an actor, known for Bem-Vindos a Beirais (2013), Vidas de Sal (1996) and O Último Beijo (2002). He died on November 27, 2016 in Faro, Algarve, Portugal.
biography.name: Carlos Santos

biography.bio: Rui Luís Brás was born on October 16, 1967. He is known for his work on Espírito Indomável (2010), Vingança (2007) and Fúria de Viver (2002).
biography.name: Rui Luís Brás

biography.bio: José Neto was born on December 25, 1955 in Luanda, Angola, Portugal. He is known for his work on Sonhos Traídos (2002), Os Maias: Cenas da Vida Romântica (2014) and Blank (2015).
biography.name: José Neto
